channel.title: Porn and viruses
channel.description:
Originally [posted it on HTG but it was "removed"][1] there (at least they don't [just delete things][2], looks like)... This was a "draft" 26 days ago, I think I'll never make it to a blog post, but now I rather post it somewhere anyway.
---
I highly suspect this link have a virus:
http://mackeeperapp3.mackeeper.com/landings/123.1/?affid=mzb_206.5278701.1445069574.2.mzb&utm_source=dblpmp&utm_medium=popunder&utm_campaign=mk_dblpmp_ww_chr_jcffra&utm_term=&utm_content=&userDefiner=mzb_2330&trt=29_352451156&alert=15&tid_ext=Pornhub
And this does not:
http://mackeeperapp3.mackeeper.com/landings/123.1/
If it does, I also believe the virus is in that URL hacking, and should be visible right there.
Being the lazy progammer* I am, I didn't bother to verify this, so...
Can anyone else confirm this? :P
Also, if you'd want to know more, there's an almost completely unrelated spin off subject here, which comes from the origin of this link, in pornhub (thus the only relationship I could find between the 2 topics). It's one of the very few porn videos I consider educational, highly interesting, very well done and insightful as to bringing questions about sexuality. But still porn, probably made over 5 years ago.
Do [take a look][3]! ;)
[1]: https://discuss.howtogeek.com/t/can-we-talk-about-anything-at-all-in-geek-life-how-about-porn-and-viruses/36348 [2]: https://meta.discourse.org/t/buying-other-questions/35207/7?u=cawas [3]: http://www.pornhub.com/view_video.php?viewkey=1394067450

item.title: Porn and viruses
item.dc:creator: @cregox Caue Rego
item.description:
@cregox wrote:

Originally posted it on HTG but it was "removed" there (at least they don't just delete things, looks like)... This was a "draft" 26 days ago, I think I'll never make it to a blog post, but now I rather post it somewhere anyway.

I highly suspect this link have a virus:

http://mackeeperapp3.mackeeper.com/landings/123.1/?affid=mzb_206.5278701.1445069574.2.mzb&utm_source=dblpmp&utm_medium=popunder&utm_campaign=mk_dblpmp_ww_chr_jcffra&utm_term=&utm_content=&userDefiner=mzb_2330&trt=29_352451156&alert=15&tid_ext=Pornhub

And this does not:

http://mackeeperapp3.mackeeper.com/landings/123.1/

If it does, I also believe the virus is in that URL hacking, and should be visible right there.

Being the lazy progammer* I am, I didn't bother to verify this, so...

Can anyone else confirm this?

Also, if you'd want to know more, there's an almost completely unrelated spin off subject here, which comes from the origin of this link, in pornhub (thus the only relationship I could find between the 2 topics). It's one of the very few porn videos I consider educational, highly interesting, very well done and insightful as to bringing questions about sexuality. But still porn, probably made over 5 years ago.

Do take a look!
